submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumSum(self, A: List[int]) -> int:
        m, n = len(A), len(A[0])
        s = set((i, j) for i in range(m) for j in range(n) if A[i][j])

        def test(s, k):
            if not s:
                return 0
            left, top, right, bottom = inf, inf, 0, 0
            for i, j in s:
                left = min(left, j)
                top = min(top, i)
                right = max(right, j)
                bottom = max(bottom, i)
            if k == 1:
                return (bottom - top + 1) * (right - left + 1)

            res = inf


            for x in range(top, bottom + 1):
                s5 = set((i, j) for i, j in s if top <= i <= x)
                l = min(j for i,j in s5)
                r = max(j for i,j in s5)
                res = min(res, (r - l + 1) * (x - top + 1) + test(s - s5, k - 1))

                s6 = set((i, j) for i, j in s if x <= i <= bottom)
                l = min(j for i,j in s6)
                r = max(j for i,j in s6)
                res = min(res, (r - l + 1) * (bottom - x + 1) + test(s - s6, k - 1))

            for y in range(left, right + 1):
                s7 = set((i, j) for i, j in s if left <= j <= y)
                t = min(i for i,j in s7)
                b = max(i for i,j in s7)
                res = min(res, (b - t + 1) * (y - left + 1) + test(s - s7, k - 1))

                s8 = set((i, j) for i, j in s if y <= j <= right)
                t = min(i for i,j in s8)
                b = max(i for i,j in s8)
                res = min(res, (b - t + 1) * (right - y + 1) + test(s - s8, k - 1))
            # print(s, k, res)
            return res

        res = test(s, 3)
        return res
